* Discover how to naturally increase your testosterone levels quickly & safety (You'll have that ""super-intense"" confidence that women sense the moment you walk into a room. They can practically smell it on you... the way animals in the wild sense a stronger male's testosterone from a hundred yards away.)
* Major reason you're not getting the sex you want! This HUGE mistake make by both bachelors and husbands... STOP doing these two habits, immediately!
* And... Why you must dress for success before you're successful! (Why hasn't anyone told you about this "sure thing" before?")
PLUS - unlike all the gooey "relationship" books out there, this book will feed you the exact habits you need to learn, so you can be yourself in-front of attractive women and not have to learn boring techniques (that are ineffective to begin with!).
And there's something here for every man, in ever romantic situation. Check this out--here's just a sample of what you're about to discover:
* How to meet and instantly "click" with an attractive woman! (Apply habit #4 to become more present and in the moment with women. You'll never miss an "obvious" invitation-signal again!)
* Discover how to burst out of a sexual rut immediately by applying these habits... tapping into a new enthusiasm for life you never thought possible!
* And... Forget what you know about exercising--follow my gym routine and notice the "hungry" look women give you. (This is an instant confidence booster for less-than-perfect guys!)
And much, much more. This truly is a dating and relationship revelation for all men... and the sexual "payoffs" you receive just for paying attention here will turn your sex life around almost overnight!

title: The Women of Cho: Heart and Seoul
description: Monica Won Cho Stell has been invited by the Won family to South Korea to learn about her mother and her family's history. Her mother committed suicide when Monica was young to protect her daughter. Detective Cale Dixon is driven from the hospital by his research boss and lover, Victoria Short. Dixon was recently stabbed in the back and is now on the mend. The Won family is preparing for Won Chanyu's traditional Korean funeral, and Mother Won is working on Monica's safe passage. Father Won prefers to use Monica as a pawn to find her father, who is believed to have killed Father Won's brother in London for vault keys. John Stell disappeared 20 years ago, leaving Monica to fend for herself through prepaid private school and university. Monica now works for a congressman and is on leave to discover what she can about her family. Rayman Stell, a cousin who lost his mother and father to the Won, is suspected of killing Chanyu Won in San Francisco. Both families are on edge as Cale Dixon orchestrates a convergence in Seoul, South Korea. This international thriller is the sequel to Cale Dixon and the Moguk Murders.

title: The Lost Eighty
description: The Lost Eighty is fiction novel loaded with mystery, fantasy and paranormal activity plus a cast of very colorful characters, a fun and wild read, written for young adults and up.

title: RealU Guide to Road Safety and Car Care
description:
Are you a menace on wheels? Find out how to handle your car-whether you're behind the wheel or under the hood-in this super-savvy Real U Guide to Road Safety and Car Care.
For new drivers who haven't had much experience with icy roads and oil filters, or for anyone who simply wants to learn more about that 2000 pounds of steel in the garage-this guide has excellent advice about handling roadside emergencies, coping with basic everyday car maintenance issues, and steering clear of the most common driving disasters. Topics covered include:
*How to jump start a car
*What to say-and what notto say-after an accident
*How to know whether you need premium gas
*How to decode your dashboard lights, and what to do when they come on
*All about rotating your tires
*Engine fluids any idiot can replace (and save big bucks)
Speed demons (and speed readers) will appreciate the four-color photographs and illustrations throughout, which make each driving tip and maintenance procedure perfectly clear. It's kind of like getting a letter filled with car care advice from a hip older brother who just won a major Nascar race. Minus the grease stains.

title: Please Friend Me Forever
description: Brianna is a lonely girl who faces typical problems that many teenagers encounter. Her parents' divorce, moving to a new school during her senior year of high school and an autistic brother seem too much at times. Brianna has a great imagination and computer access to the internet. It opens a world of options and a fantasy about finding Mr. Right. This Christian Fiction Novel tells the story of a young girl that survives many changes as she faces her own fragmented spiritual beliefs. Brianna must understand about safety online because the internet can become an addiction. When a person is online, you cannot always be sure who you are talking to. The personal accounts have a way of exaggerating, embellishing, and constructing a virtual pretend reality that is more fiction than fact. Her youthful optimism and ceaseless hope in finding Mr. Right have her searching social media sites for the answer. Join Brianna as she learns the truth about herself and the real world. She struggles to connect with God, as relationships seem to be increasing complicated in a digital culture.

title: Greek Mythrotica Vol 1: The Adventures of Aphrodite
description: Join Aphrodite, the Greek goddess of love, on her adventures of romance and self-awareness as she discovers her own power, desires and limitations. In eroticizing these ancient myths, Aphrodite discovers great depths of compassion as she faces issues of acceptance, understanding and sensitivity in her greatest teachers...Haphaestus, Adonis and Ares.

title: Collectives In A Forsaken Landscape
description:
Illustrated, A collection taken from the archives of my journal, some would be from my website and other places online. What would remain within the nightmares are written within these pages. Some of the short stories included in this are House of Spiders (written originally for Reality Check, an outtake,) and INSECT. Few of the stories are works of fiction, others are true as one would notice with Accident Revisited. Featuring the centerpiece gothic epic written about the tradegy on September 11, 2001, titled Seasons of Black September in its expanded form.
"Take a look at the rest of this writer's works...it's worth it." -- Nicholas S. Stember, author, Twilight (review on AuthorsDen of short story House of Spiders.)"Nick Pacione's imagination twists and weaves as incredible stories unfold to scare the living daylights out of his fans." --- Barbara Malenky, Author Human Oddities

title: She Never Said Good-Bye
description: The author, an ordained minister, grippingly reflects the range of strong emotions, questions and wrestlings following his wife's sudden suicide.

title: Star Raiders and the Lost Expedition
description: Two freelance adventurers Mike Tippin and Justin Jobbs, take an unusual mission from a beautiful Princess Tygla Tyger to rescue her brother from the evil humanoid, Lord Drax of the Xatu Empire. But the mission goes awry as Tygla's Brother, Xman, escapes the dreaded battle ship Hades and joins up with the adventurers. Now they must join forces to stop Drax from siphoning the ultimate power from the center of the galaxy.

title: The Ugly Duckling; Adventures of a Squirrel; Elephant Baby (My Fun-to-Read Books, #2)
description:
The Ugly Duckling: A baby duck that does not look like the others struggles to find a place to belong.
Adventures of a Squirrel: A baby squirrel is captured by an explorer but becomes an explorer himself.
Elephant Baby: A new elephant to the herd is taught how to work.

title: My Thoughts
description:
My Thoughts is Volume Three of Richard Digance's writings following on from the success of the two previous publications "My Poems" and "My Words".
This book is the very latest collection of thoughts, poems, lyrics and observations from one of Britain's most evergreen of performers.
Thought-provoking, belly-aching, this is Richard Digance at his best.

title: Minnie Moo The Extraordinary Adventures of an Ordinary Cat
description:
One bright morning Minnie Moo and Mr T set off on an adventure to Little Village to warn all the anipals of the danger of their new neighbors. Having moved to the 3rd tree on the left the Hawk Family has taken over Little Village swooping down on any unsuspecting anipal taking them away to never to be seen again land.
Terrified, the anipals are all in hiding too afraid to go outside. After a meeting with Mayor Floppy Ear, Mr T and Minnie Moo, the Little Villagers vote and decide to go on a mission to rescue their beloved village.
Forming a congo line of courage they go in search of Mr Hawk in the hope he and his family will change their ways. To do this Minnie Moo must overcome his hawk-o-phobia and stand up to the big bird.
This is an inspirational tail with a big message; it's always ok to do the right thing. It's never ok to be a bully.
A great read to read to children and older children who enjoy reading chapter books, cat and animal lovers and those looking for a fun inspirational tale.

title: The Bible and the Near Death Experience
description: Near death experiences are becoming more well known because of programs like "I Survived: Beyond and Back." Attention for this phenomenon is being publicized in a unique way. More and more people, young and old are beginning to realize that there may be life after death. My mission is to make the near death experience even bigger and widely known to the global community of near death believers.

title: Brooklyn Lasagna
description: Don't be fooled, this is not a cookbook, but a collection of short stories of life in Brooklyn, from the beginning. This book was written for family and friends, and anyone who has an affection for Brooklyn.

title: Martin and the Pigeon
description:
Martin loves going and feeding the pigeons. But he loves to feed one pigeon in particular: his friend, who he calls Peter.
His mum is a little concerned about this new friendship. And even more so when Martin says that the pigeon is talking to him!
Come and join Martin the boy and Peter the pigeon on their wonderful friendship and adventures.

title: Zox: School of Gods
description:
Akuro Kikuchi, the ten year old of a single mother believed in something that his mother tried to tell him over and over did not. What is she hiding?
When he is not swayed from believing that what was supposed to be myth was real, he finds himself in the bizarrest situation of all; one which he at first can hardly believe isn't a dream. Not only does he find himself at a magical school, but its location is one he never would have remotely thought of.
Akuro also finds himself in the company of someone he's upset while learning more than he'd ever known about his family. And whilst attending ZOX: School of Gods, he's plunged into an adventure of a lifetime as the evils of the world emerge to try and destroy the world.
Will he be able to protect the world with the aid of his friends and allies? Or will the world as they once knew it, perish forevermore without the rebirth that the prophecy of Ragnarok once promised?
Approximately 102,000 words

title: Riddle Me This and Other Riddle Rhymes
description: Rhyming riddles, with pictures, for young readers

title: The Lesbian
description:
"What is a lesbian? Is she a criminal, a vile degenerate? Or is she the tragic heroine of a drama in which she is -- at least subconsciously -- an unwilling participant?
"Called queer, bull, dyke, butch, lady-lover, morphodyke, gay, she is hated by women because they are unwilling to see a part of themselves in her. And she is reviled by men because she represents a third force in the battle between the sexes -- a superfluous competitor.
"Whatever she is, there are no quick answers, no sudden cures, no psychiatric wonder drugs which will correct her condition now and forever.
"...this book -- more than anything else -- is a sincere attempt to make the lesbian understandable."

title: Oops! Did I Really Post That
description: Social media has change our lives and the way we communicate with each other. It has been a blessing in that we can be in touch with friends and family who we have not seen in ages. It can be a course in that we have the power to do some really hurtful and dumb things that we cannot just delete to make them go away. There is an old fashion technique that can make social media and all online communication be a pleasure and move us forward; it is called "Good Manners". Oops! Did I Really Post That? Online Etiquette in the Digital Age is a series of simple guide lines to help us all be more civil and kind as we connect with the world around us.

title: The Gnosis Behind the Mind of Sentient Man
description:
Brotherhood of the White Temple Church. Sermons-Lessons
and Daily Meditations. Metaphysics.
By the study of man, we can study God as we re made in his image. By being aware of and conscious of your surroundings and thoughts can open your divine self. Learning to see with your inner eye.

title: I, Lovecraft: A Short Story
description: A man finds his best friend one morning in a state of extreme melancholy and discovers the world around us is not quite what it seems. Length: 6,400 words.

title: Desert Venom Motorcycle Club: The Complete Novella
description:
Good vs Evil with the motor revved up!
An outlaw motorcycle club is stealing innocent young women and selling them to the highest bidder. Someone's got to put a stop to it, enter good guy biker, Isaac Stone. His gang of military-trained volunteers go where the local cops can't to save these girls and bring justice to their captors.
24,000 deliciously naughty words. This complete novella is sold alternatively as a series of short stories, so you're getting a good deal.
All characters 18+.
It's hard to find an excerpt clean enough to put here! Read the sample!

title: Bugs in Shoes
description: Bugs In Shoes is a rhyming book with drawings of child-like "bugs" wearing a lively assortment of shoes and clothing. It is designed to help children visually associate the written word with the specific article of clothing shown on each page. Colorful and bright illustrations of happy little anthropomorphic bugs donning shoes and garb will capture a child's attention, just as the snappy sing-song rhymes will help them remember the poem and more easily associate each word with its corresponding picture. And lest we all forget, bugs wear wonderful shoes! Picture book-ages 0-6.

title: Daniel and Kelly Double Bang
description:
Daniel and Kelly were on top of the world. Their business and personal lives were firing on all cylinders. They were very much in love and had just celebrated their new engagement with some good ole fashioned anal. Congratulations! Oh, I forgot to mention they run a porn site and love to fuck on camera, and not just each other. Their new friend Dana the smoking hot stripper will soon find out what double stuffed means!
Warning: This ebook contains very explicit descriptions of double penetration FFM sex. Only mature adults who will not be offended by such content should read this story.

title: Idols
description: 1911. A novel by the British author. This is one of 28 works by Locke available from Kessinger Publishing.

title: 50 Most Asked Questions from the Newly Unemployed
description:
Editorial Reviews
About the Author
From janitor to stockbroker, trucking company owner to co-founder of the National College Association, Cleon Cox III has invested his time, energy and expertise as facilitator of the Job Finders Support Group, Portland, OR.
Born in San Jose, California, Cox explored careers in both blue and white collar arenas before becoming a business owner. His experience reflects customer service. His background exemplifies family and commitment to community.
Cox attended his first Job Finders Support Group shortly after selling his business in 1991. Ed Burpee, retired publisher, founded the group, which helps job finders end their week with renewed enthusiasm. Cox is an expert in communication along with mentoring people to achieve success in their lives.

title: Experiment 26: Science Meet Madness
description: Meet DR Albert Strom, he enjoys long walks on the beach, deep and meaningful discussion's, and he also likes the idea of taking an average human being and turning them into a vicious killing machine. After twenty five attempts at creating a murder machine, the good doctor decides to give it one last try and with a set of fresh subjects, he is determined to make his dream a reality. There is no such thing as madness when in pursuit of a scientific goal now, is there?

title: The Anxious Mom
description:
Do you struggle with fear for your children? Do you feel anxious? Do you wish you could keep them in a bubble in order to protect them?
If you answered yes, allow the scriptural truths of The Anxious Mom to calm your heart and give you perspective about trusting God.
Walk step-by-step with a mom who sought out God's Word to calm her fearful heart and remind her of the Truth that God is in control, even when her frantic thoughts feel so out of control.
Download a FREE copy here: http://bit.ly/1CJeWa1

title: Lilac Journey: Biography of a Gangster Girl
description: LiLAC JOURNEY Biography of a Gangster Girl is the true survival story of H. Lorraine Long, nicknamed because of her petite size as a child, Peewee. The rough ordeal of sexual and physical abuse as a child set her on a whirlwind journey to discover who she actually was. Not given the privilege of a formal education, her natural curiosity taught her how to survive. Whether selling a bag of dope or toting a .45 caliber pistol she made her way in a sordid and dangerous journey through life and a million dollars too.

title: Quicksand - The Way of Life in the Slums
description: Part of the "Way of Life" Series

title: The Acid Alkaline Diet and pH Balanced Lunch Recipes
description:
This Book is filled with information that can be very helpful in understanding the importance of a well PH Balanced diet. You will find tips that can help you determine if your diet is inline or is way off from an acid alkaline balanced perspective. In addition,you will find many delicious recipes to help you learn theart of selecting the right ingredients for a healthy alkaline meal.
You will also learn
Learn The Basics of PH Balanced Diets PH Balanced System and Diet related Issue What are Consequences of a System That Is Acidic. What can you do to Improve our PH Alkaline System

title: The Cougar's Stranger Sex Encounter
description:
Carol has been feeling a bit depressed of late, but her best friend Megan isn't letting her get away with that. She insists she get a makeover and get out to a few hole in the wall clubs. Carol isn't sure, but when she gets there and begins to receive attention from younger men...well, count her in!
Warning: This ebook contains explicit descriptions of rough sex and includes cougar and cub sex and stranger sex. Only mature adults who won't find that offensive should read this story.

title: The New Modernism: An Appraisal of the Theology of Barth and Brunner
description: It is accordingly one of the chief aims of the present volume to investigate the relation between the "earlier" and the "later" Barth, and the relation between the "earlier" and the "later" Brunner as well as the present relationship between these outstanding Crisis theologians. Among his most noted writings, The New Modernism was the fist major work of Cornelius Van Til. Herein, Van Til deals with the works of Barth and Brunner and their "Theology of Crisis,"warning a generation of evangelicals of the danger of neo-orthodoxy as a new form of modernism. He pays special attention to the philosophical background of dialectical theology and the bearing of this theology on the life of the Church. Dr. Cornelius Van Til, served as a professor of apologetics at Westminster Theological Seminary, Philadelphia, for 43 years. He retired in 1972, but remained as an emeritus professor until his death in 1987. Van Til, an immigrant from The Netherlands, was one of the most respected apologetic theologians of his time. Van Til earned degrees from Calvin College, Princeton Theological Seminary, and Princeton University on his way to becoming an Orthodox Presbyterian Minister. He served throughout the ministry and scholarly fields, including teaching as an instructor of apologetics at Princeton Theological Seminary and being heavily involved with the foundation of the Philadelphia-Montgomery Christian Academy. His most noted writings include The New Modernism, The Defense of the Faith, and Christianity and Barthianism. Much of his work with apologetics focuses on the presuppositions of humans, the difference between believers and non-believers, and the opposition between Christian and non-Christian worldviews.

title: The Bedding March
description: Single and sexy Isabelle is forty years old, living at home with her parents in Washington D.C., and working for nada at a bookstore. Her friends and family wonder whether quirky Isabelle will ever throw off her under-achieving ways to find love and happiness. Even Isabelle has her moments of despair, especially since she's clueless about how to help herself. While moaning to her long-time therapist, and boring herself silly, she receives an accidental bump on the head. Suddenly, she begins attracting one devastatingly handsome and successful man after another. Though still maintaining she has no interest in a real relationship, these men, and a new home, soon convince her otherwise. Isabelle marches across the beds of men, and along the way, finds the one bed to call her own.

title: Way Down Cellar
description: The boys and the local townspeople had two things in common: a dislike for Old Lady Dengler--the boys because she confiscated any ball landing in her yard, and the townspeople because they thought she was their crankiest, most cantankerous citizen. When Frank Wilson moved to town, he earned the admiration of the boys because he snatched a football out from Lady Dengler's grasp. He was also determined to solve the hundred and fifty-year mystery of Parson Burden, the Tory, whose mysterious activities during the Revolution had never been explored. The three friends had three special interests: winning games for their football team, finding out what happened under the church and disturbing the old lady. They did all three superbly, in this exciting story combining football and mystery.

title: Awakening The Giant In You Through The Masters Perspective
description:
With a definite chief aim, definite plans and appropriate actions you can transform your ideas into its physical equivalent and hence live a successful and fulfilled life.
This Photo Magazine presents to you the ideas of greatest minds ever in a manner that transforms the mind of its reader to a realm equivalent to those of the masters of success.

title: Destiny
description: Annie, an attractive, outgoing woman and never short of romance in her life believes she can find true love one day. Her two daughters, Belle and Britney fathered by different partners are the ones who give her strength. After bad news of her father's health, she finds comfort with Shinda, a tall dark handsome man who she has seen before in the past. Her feelings for him are strong and uncontrollable. When she believes she is finally happy, she receives some bad news, the lack of support from Shinda makes Annie question their secretive relationship. With little effort, she begins to date again to move on, but can she truly forget about Shinda, the man she struggles to resist or will they meet again later in life? What does it take for Annie to feel a sense of security and commitment to be happy in her love life?

title: Winds of Change: Notes for the Reconquista
description:
"We need to be ready for the change. We need to be ready to seize the moment and ride the tide. To do so, we need to create the new generations of political soldiers, of Europeans - who have the capacity, the moral compass, the knowledge and the practical skills to fulfil their duty to Europe and its people."
We live in 'exciting times'. Successions of stunning electoral defeats for the forces of liberalism are symptoms of a citizens' revolt against the elites and their democratic deficit.
These populist rebellions are incoherent, powerful yet literally reactionary, responses to globalism. The millions of citizens who have slapped the elites in the face know what they are against, but have no guiding vision of what they are for.
The resulting lack of direction is very dangerous. The globalists have been shaken to the core, but they are already regrouping and planning their counter-attacks. This renewed danger can only be met if the forces of tradition and identity develop a coherent, positive vision for a better future.
Populist revolts are not enough. For secure, lasting victory they have to be transformed into full-scale National Revolutions. But there can be no revolution in action without first a revolution in ideas and in the hearts of future revolutionaries. This book represents a vital step on the road to creating a winning National Revolutionary ideology for the 21st Century.

title: Murder in the Books Galore
description:
There is a lot more than reading and sipping lattes going on in the Books Galore Boutique. And as Alana Simms is about to find out, murderers do not like it when you start nosing around in their business.
Murder in the Books Galoreis a cozy mystery short read set in the idyllic village of Plum Orchards, nestled in the Sierra Foothills east of Sacramento, California. But there is nothing idyllic about murder, and there is nothing cozy about tripping over a body in the biography section of a dark bookstore.
At least, that is what Alana thought as she struggled to breathe and make her way to the office phone.

title: Reptile
description:
Many years ago in a faraway universe called Resolution, the King of a city called Pyrodean Star sends his son, Flame, along with a group of Daredevils, on a mission aboard the starship Hinroda to find life on other planets.
They went through galaxies and past planets until they found Earth, the third planet from the sun, and sent a dome-shaped city into its ocean. They settled on Venus.
As they were heading to their dome-shaped city, their pods split up entering Earth's atmosphere. The others landed in the sea, but Flame kept going like a meteor until he reached the city, landing in a young girl's garden. To her it looked like a burnt egg, so she decided to care for it, not knowing that the day it hatches would be the day her whole life would change.
Join Vincent T. Irving on a beautifully drawn journey that spans the universe and beyond.

title: A Special Tutoring Session
description:
I was surprised and a bit angry when I walked in on Sally and Tommy. They were supposed to be studying for their college classes and instead she was giving him a blowjob! I hadn't tutored her for all those months just so she could neglect her studies and screw another student! Something in me snapped, and I decided if she wanted to learn about sex, I'd teach her. I had no idea she'd love it so much, and I didn't expect that I would as well!
Warning: This ebook contains very explicit descriptions of sexual activity during an ffm threesome sex encounter and includes first lesbian sex. Only mature adults who won't find that offensive should read this story.

title: When In Rome
description:
Fix-ups are the worst for Katelyn "Kate" Gray, who hasn't trusted a man since her father took off when her mother was pregnant with her and her twin brother Jason. So when the gods send Kate back to ancient Rome and into the arms of a famous gladiator, she's certainly going to have something to say about it. Even if he is, for all intents and purposes, her soul mate!
Losing has never been an option for Crispinus "Crispin" Agallon, the champion gladiator of the thriving Roman metropolis. But when he happens upon a woman standing in his chambers - a woman he finds himself very much attracted to (and thusly acts on such feelings) - she immediately flees, leaving him with burning questions he wants answered, and a small chest containing a king's ransom in rubies.
Without considering love - a fool's illusion, he believes - Crispin sets out in search of the bewitching beauty that snared his attention earlier that day. Kate never wanted a guardian, especially some overbearing, loutish, uncouth gladiator who calls himself "Crispinus"; and yet she can't help but admit that having this big, strong, and strikingly handsome brute at her side feels, surprisingly, right...
Crispin thinks he knows what to expect of his new companion (all women are the same, aren't they), only she surprises him with her undeniable innocence, her sweet spirit, and her love. Who is this strange foreign woman, and how will he stop himself from losing his heart?

title: North American A-5/RA-5C Vigilante
description:
This aircraft was to replace the AJ-1/2 and the A3D as a nuclear attack bomber. This twin engine bomber carried the Linear Bomb (nuclear weapon) between the two J78-GE-8. The bomb was dropped/ejected horizontally out the rear of the fuselage. The aircraft was also used as a tanker, a Photo Recon and ECM. This was the second heaviest aircraft accepted by the Navy the first being the A-3. The first prototype flew August 31,1958 and deliveries started in 1960 to VAH-7.
The new USS Enterprise was the first ship to deploy the A-5.

title: Cowboys and Werewolves
description:
When Marshal Felton goes out into the badlands in his first solo pursuit of a gang of train robbers he discovers that the gang is really a pack of werewolves. They capture him and drag him to their lair where they make him a deal: survive the night and he can go free. To survive he's going to have to satisfy their appetites for... man flesh.
Caution: This MMMM adventure contains shapeshifting men, throbbing cocks, pulsating orgasms and hot man on man on man action by the campfire.

title: Superman #175 (Vol. 2)
description:
"Doomsday Rex"
The 100th issue in the volume 2 of "Superman" comic book title, after the famous #75 where Superman "died". But also, part of the month event named as "Joker's Last Laugh". Therefore, The Joker got in a secret government facility and liberates Doomsday.

title: Getting to be the Experienced One: A Sweet Tale of Romantic Firsts
description:
Kate never imagined she would be the first notch on Eric's bedpost. Sure they were neighbors and had known each other for years, but the thought never crossed her mind, until today. Her boyfriend knew she wanted to have at least one time where she could be the person with experience, and with his permission, she's ready to show this eighteen year old man just what the world of sexy romance can be.
Warning: This ebook contains very explicit descriptions of sex. Only mature adults who will not be offended by such content should read this story.

title: Tricks For Perfect 10 Make-up
description:
Bookmasters is pleased to present you with a first look at the recently translated title Tricks for a Perfect 10 Make-Up by Marta Guillen Munoz. For the average woman, attaining the perfect make-up application can be a daunting task. It involves trying countless products, shades, brands, and application methods before finding the perfect combination. But then, how do you know when you have it right? The right make-up application will make you feel confident at all times. In Tricks for a Perfect 10 Make-Up, Marta Guillen Munoz will guide readers to achieve the proper make-up application to help minimize small imperfections and create a natural and healthy look.
It is imperative to start with the right foundation. This book will guide you through the different types of foundations, how they should be applied, and which are right for your unique skin. Once you have the right foundation, then it is time to add some color.Do not underestimate the power of color. It will help you look radiant, while giving you a natural and healthy look. In Tricks for a Perfect 10 Make-Up, learn what blush is right for your skin and look, how to achieve a knock-out gaze with eye color and mascara, and get lips that fascinate.
More important than learning how to apply your make-up correctly, is learning how not to apply your make-up. Learn the biggest make-up mistakes, such as: creating a mask effect, visible lip liner, single color eyelids, ignoring light, and many more mistakes that so many women make.
It is also important to understand that as we age, our needs for make-up change. We begin in adolescence by covering blemishes, then later in like look to cover fine lines and wrinkles. Tricks for a Perfect 10 Make-Up will show you how to adjust your make-up over time to help you radiate beauty at any age. Learn basic step by step instructions for applying make-up during your teen years, as young adults, and finally as adults. Photos, illustrations and detailed instructions are provided to guide you along every page, Tricks for a Perfect 10 Make-Up will show you how to transform your look and uncover the amazing beauty that you have been striving for.

title: Love or Kill Them All
description: A powerful story that moves through the streets of the city, through homes, nightclubs, gambling dens, cafes encountering along the way love-starved women, brutal men, pimps, prostitutes, bums, hoodlums, gamblers, perverts, criminals, dope addicts . . . Name Your Vice and you will find it here among the damned . . . the lustful . . . the violent.

title: Authors vs. Goodreads
description:
If you are an Independent author, or even a published author thinking about joining Goodreads, I hope you will take a look at my free booklet and closely examine your motives before giving Goodreads, and thus Amazon, a bunch of free information that they will then own and control. If you believe that Goodreads 'Review' system is fair, you need to read about troll review attacks that are also documented widely on the Internet. And let me warn you about a number of broken features on the website that may affect your sales. The main thing you must understand, though, is that you are on the bottom of the food chain at Goodreads. You are the income that keeps the server farm humming but you are entering into an adversarial relationship, not only with the pampered readers but the overworked staff that doesn't even know their own rules when they punish you because there are so damned many rules and the documentation is broken, outdated chaos.
The booklet is short and free. It provides a lot of links to information on the Internet that you should know and links to the documentation at Goodreads. If nothing else, at least read the first page and heed the warnings in the links provided.

title: Diary of Night #1
description: A duel between vampires leaves both crumbling into dust. In the aftermath, a plot is hatched and a trap is laid. And Catherine Morrison, a 927-year old vampire, is smack in the middle of it all!

title: The Golden Screw - Book One: "Dita the Naughty Auditor"
description:
Book-One of Wes Royal's "The Golden Screw" collection sees the return of the irresistible Gilda Cane and her cohorts of deeply perverted and highly dominant female friends and acquaintances as Hugh Bristol ("Hubris"), her new husband finds he might be wedded but any bliss he might take from the union is likely to be extremely painful and ALWAYS humiliating.
CONTAINS EXPLICIT ADULT MATERIAL

title: Jake's Monthly- Lovecraftian Horror Anthology
description:
This is the second anthology published by the publisher Jake's Monthly, whose goal is to publish a new collection of short fiction every month for at least a year.
This collection contains nothing but stories inspired by H.P. Lovecraft, a man who was likely the most influential horror writer of all time. The stories within are amazingly diverse, spreading out from Lovecraft's signature fear of the unknown to his lesser-known comedic stylings and even extending as far as a genre which often receives disrespect: Christian Lovecraftiana!
New voices and returning authors, many highly-experienced voices in fiction, have come together to present this collection.
We hope you enjoy it.

title: Thread: And Selected New York Poems
description: Many critical voices, in several languages, have praised the poet Vasyl Makhno. But in the case of this book such praise is only half of the golden apple. Without an excellent or, more precisely, a fully adequate translator, the poet's name would be meaningless to most people, and a book of bad translations would distort his name. Makhno is very lucky to have found an adequate English-language translator. Orest Popovych, although (or, perhaps, because) he is a scientist by profession, is able to capture not only the text but also the subtext of this poetry. Never attempting, as some poet-translators do, to outsing the original song, Popovych attentively listens not only to he words but also to the melody and spirit of these poems long before putting pen to paper. As a result, those who do not have the Ukrainian language, may rest assured that they get the kernel of these powerful texts, and those who do will delight in the translator's art. Bohdan Rubchak, Professor-Emeritus, University of Illinois at Chicago, bilingual poet and literary critic

title: Homage To Emma: The Sex Diary of a Male Submissive
description: The Sex Diary of a Male Submissive. Martin Groves, a twenty six year old 'love rat', has been cheating on his wife Kirsty for nearly three years. When she finally discovers his infidelity, she throws him out and Martin lands at a B&B run by Emma, an officer in the local prison. While his new landlady is pleasant enough, Martin quickly learns that her husband left her for a barmaid, and she's become particularly hostile to men. When she assigns her new boarder a number of domestic chores, he willingly agrees. And so begins Emma's deliberate scheme to make Martin her slavish houseboy. With a strong fixation for the female sex, Martin easily relents to the woman's demands, and he's soon turned into her groveling slave. Though she can be a hard and demanding mistress, a strong, even affectionate, bond develops between the two. Martin is soon a fixture in Emma's female world, where he's humiliated, punished and trained to sexually service his mistress and her many female friends. The Prison Governor, Vanessa, uses him as a party toy, then later a sadistic male guard will force him to suck cock and take it in the ass. He'll be subjected to female wrestlers, a sailor and his horny crew, and extensive pony training that will prove to one of his most horrific trials.

title: Beach Management
description:
Beach Management Eric C. F. Bird Geostudies Beach Management is the latest book in the Coastal Morphology and Research Series, and deals with the origin of beaches, the processes at work on them, the causes of beach erosion and accretion, and the ways in which the coast has been modified by anti-erosion structures. The emplacement of artificial bleaches, and the use and development of beaches for recreation is also covered. This volume provides background for those concerned with planning and management of the coast (particularly where there are problems of erosion and beach maintenance), beach usage and recreational development. It also provides information and case studies for courses in coastal management.
Ch. 1. The origin of beach sediments
Ch. 2. Beach processes and morphology
Ch. 3. Causes of beach erosion
Ch. 4. Structures for beach protection
Ch. 5. Beach nourishment
Ch. 6. Beach use and management

title: Medieval History of Korea
description: Graphic novel of the medieval history of Korea

title: Five Gold Rings: an Elizabethan Love Story
description: Rating love higher than duty or convention, they defied the rigid rules of the Elizabethan court to marry without royal consent. When their secret was discovered they were imprisoned in separate quarters in the Tower of London. She was Lady Katherine Grey, sister to a queen and cousin to three reigning monarchs--and heir presumptive to Elizabeth I. He was Edward Seymour, Earl of Hertford, son of the executed Lord Protector. Both were to pay a high price for their audacity.

title: The Supermodel's Tightest Hole
description:
He's having a horrible day. He woke up late and almost missed his plane. The flight was horrible, too. Then, his hotel lost the reservation, and instead of the luxury suite he'd counted on, he ended up in a just a regular room. He figures a few drinks will take the edge off, and he's happy when he goes to the hotel lounge and meets a girl so beautiful she has to be a supermodel. He's even happier when she suggests they go to his room, and she takes him on a wild ride complete with his first ever anal sex!
Warning: This ebook contains very explicit descriptions of sexual activity during a stranger sex encounter. It includes oral sex, deep throat, rough sex, anal sex, ass to mouth, and semen swallowing. It is intended for mature readers who will not be offended by graphic depictions of sex acts between consenting adults.

title: Sam Spank and Wild Widow
description:
In this sexy and hilarious parody of hard-boiled detective fiction, Molly Synthia introduces Sam Spank, a detective with some very, very persuasive interrogation techniques. If you value your anal integrity, you might not want to lie to Detective Spank! It's a blisteringly rough first anal sex experience for a widow who had a great deal to gain from the death of her underworld husband...
Warning: This ebook contains very explicit descriptions of sexual activity and includes rough first anal sex, reluctant first anal sex, and more. Only mature adults who won't find that offensive should read this story.

title: Penumbra
description:
Fed up with the dirty city and a disenchanting life as a fashion model, Beauty's world is at least safe. But the illusion of safety shatters the night that she frees herself from her self-imposed fears only to be thrust into the magical underbelly of the city, where forces that want to save humanity and evil beings that want to feed off humanity's despair fight for balance and power.
Forced from both the comforts and the trappings of her old life, now hunted by a cadre of sinister, rat-faced business men, Beauty's only hope is to join with a strange magical ally. Together, with the help of fae creatures in unlikely guises, they must seek out an enchanted, improbable artifact that can heal the city before evil tips the balance, once and for all.
This powerful coming-of-age fairy tale follows the path of a young heroine who chooses to take fate into her own hands for the first time in her life, and of the consequences that her choice has on the magical beings of the city.

title: Caroline Coquette
description: Cover Art by Freeman Elliot

title: 1,001 Trivia Questions
description: Stump your friends! Surprise your family! Find the answers to such questions as: What two actors won Oscars for playing the same character in two different films? How many bones are there in the human body? What is the southernmost state in the United States? What is the largest living rodent? Which actress/film director first achieved national exposure as the Coppertone baby? When was the zipper invented? How did Confederate General "Stonewall" Jackson earn his nickname? Who hosted The Tonight Show on NBC before Johnny Carson? 1,001 Trivia Questions is a must-have for every trivia lover.

title: Wherever Love Leads
description:
They shared every secret but one
Court artist Lorraine Stewart knew the accused was innocent of murder. She saw it in Scott Michaels's eyes--eyes that constantly occupied her thoughts. And that same fascination compelled her to follow him when he left Indiana a free man.
Scott thought he'd left the past behind--no one would intrude on his Caribbean paradise. No one except a beautiful stranger called Raina ....

title: Spectaccolo: A Tale of Darkness and Light
description: A baby, abandoned at the circus. Left to sleep among the lions. Leona is a beautiful, determined, talented performer. Abandoned at the circus as an infant, she befriends a pack of circus lions who become her family as she becomes Leona, the Lion Tamer. Her performances gain her the highest recognition and eventually garner the deepest jealousies. Kidnapped by the neighboring circus, Leona and her lions are forced to perform against their will. Unable to escape, Leona is commanded to train an erratic male lion with a history of violence. Love and loss, discovery and deceit, Spectaccolo is a story about a girl becoming a woman in a place like none other.

title: Ballots, Bullets & Kabulshit: An Afghan Election
description:
Ahead of the 2009 presidential elections in Afghanistan, Australian electoral advisor and Gruen Planet panellist Toby Ralph joined a UN team to assist local authorities unused to free and fair democratic processes - and in some cases, not keen on adopting them. Amid the 'War on Terror', resistance ranged from corruption and bureaucratic ineptitude to lethal violence.
Ralph's diarised account is a rare glimpse into the day-to-day experiences of those charged with delivering the freedom and democracy Western leaders promise the disenfranchised. With the wry humour of a seasoned politico (or someone trying to distract themselves from the very real dangers of their situation), he provides snapshots of life in Kabul, a primer in the political shambles of a failing state, and the reflections of a non-combatant working in a war zone in a suit and tie. He is whisked between meetings in armoured cars, tries to avoid sitting on the AK-47 down the back of the couch at his lodgings, dines with colleagues in sandbagged candlelit restaurants, and attempts to convince the Electoral Commission chairman - and friend of President Hamid Karzai - that having an election is a good idea.
That the poll ended in farce, with Karzai's reinstatement by default, means the UN will be sending another group of advisors when next an election is reluctantly called.

title: Concise Herb Guide
description: This beautifully illustrated mini field guide is packed with information on the most common herbs from around the world. Many of these plants grow wild in Britain and other parts of Europe, and can also be cultivated in gardens. The guide additionally includes exotic but commonly used species such as Vanilla, Cloves, Cinnamon and Star-anise.More than 180 herbs are included, all of which are illustrated with superb full-colour artworks that show details of the flowers and leaves, roots and bark where applicable, and growth habit of each plant. A concise written account covering culinary, medicinal and other uses, size, description, habitat and distribution appears on the same page.The easy-to-follow layouts and superb artworks aid quick and accurate identification, making this book an indispensable reference in the field as well as at home. It is compact enough to fit in the pocket, yet packed with essential information. To protect it against the elements in the field, the book is wrapped in a durable plastic wallet. Also included is a fold-out insert with at-a-glance illustrations showing herbs grouped by colour.Renowned natural history artists Christine Hart-Davis, Bridgette James and David Sutton painted the illustrations.

title: Brandi Bare #1
description:
First Semester
Brandi is headed to college. First, she needs to convince her father to let her stay on campus. Then, while trying to learn the ropes of college life, she needs to be careful of other forces at work against her...namely a vindictive student named Dylan.

title: Headline Nurse
description: An adventurous career girl caught up in the fury and romance of the newspaper world.

title: Bewitching Beloved
description:
Front cover tagline: "Had she already loved him, in another life?"
Back cover blurb:
A UNION OF LOVE
For the first time in her life, Alix was afraid. She knew she'd seen this man before! Why, he was the very same man that haunted her constantly in her dreams! Suddenly, her job as a union organizer seemed small indeed compared to this all-important event. She instinctively knew now that she must have him, must love and marry the same man she came to destroy!

title: King Shag's Wicked-Traditional Downhummah Recipe Book
description:
A wicked-odd compendium of recipes for cooking under-utilized species including road-kills. Here, for the first and maybe last time, the editor Seth Poole claims, "We take pride in these Folk Recipes and offer 'em to you, the New Mainah who moved up here from New Jersey... and who shall always be known as "that person from Away."
With historical photos, some histerical, and drawings by cartoonist Bill Harris, the King Shag crew aids A.J. Campbell in delivering true-grit Maine flavor.

title: A City Upon a Hill the founding of Norton in Context: 1620-1750
description: Chris Bogosh, one of Norton's native sons, was taken up with a desire to dig into Norton's past to better understand the roots of its founding. This book is the result of that effort. In it he provides a fresh look at what were the religious moorings of the founders of Norton in the context of New England from 1620 to 1750. Perhaps this book will provide an impetus for some to re-examine their values and help them to ponder where they are at present. After all that is what anniversaries are for, and why not make Norton's 300th one to be remembered! Rev. Paul N. Wanamaker Norton, Massachusetts June, 2011

title: The Quest for Brian
description: One young man's struggle for gay liberation in the 1970s takes him down a path from which there seems to be no escape. As the reader watches Dave Rosen, falling farther away from the man he loves, from Champaign-Urbana to Chicago, Illinois, descend into a pit of obsession, drug addiction and then victory, they will be witnesses to actual historical events, heretofore unprinted, that will astound. This autobiographical historical fiction raises questions deep in the soul of every human being, gay or straight

title: Canberra: A Pictorial Journey
description:
Take a tour of Australia's history and politics, drop in on miniature worlds, explore outer space of soak up the city's fine art and architecture.
Canberra - A Pictorial Journey captures the essence of the Australian capital in stunning colour photographs.

title: Coven of the Cursed
description:
Sex, domination, opportunism, submission, fame, love, pleasure and guilt are mixed with fantastic and unusual elements in these eight short stories, through creative use of aesthetic and conceptual resources.
Situations emerging from life itself, recreated with exaggeration and expressive intensity, make us reflet on certain areas of daily existence.

title: My Audition with Natalie
description:
Something about Natalie completely captivated me, and as we sat and waited for our shot at being stars, I don't know what came over me! I'd never been with a woman before, but before I knew it, the two of us were making out on the couch and I was right in the middle of my first lesbian experience. That's when the casting director arrived and joined right in!
Warning: This ebook contains very explicit descriptions of ffm threesome sex and includes first lesbian sex and first anal sex. Only mature adults who won't find that offensive should read this story.

title: Emilia and the Watcher
description:
Emilia hears something outside of her window and remembers the explosive last experience with her ex-boyfriend, when he showed up and took her roughly and the most explosive orgasm she ever had came mingled with pain in the midst of her first anal sex. The memories are overwhelming, but not everything is in her mind. There is indeed someone outside of her window, and his obsession with Emilia is overwhelming.
Warning: This ebook contains very explicit descriptions of rough sex and includes first anal sex, forced semen swallowing, and ass to mouth. Only mature adults who won't find that offensive should read this ebook.

title: Newfound
description: When a young girl named Kate Grace finds out that her noble father planned an arranged marriage for her, to the prince, on her 18th birthday, she decides to run away. Her mysterious new friend, Eric Summer, decides to follow her, and she finds out something that could've put his live in danger. He was from Fordess, a rival land of Kate's. Eric introduces Kate to an interesting man, Sir Stephen, who uncovers a shocking secret that Kate didn't even know about herself. She was the Lost Princess of a forgotten kingdom, Arainia, of which Stephen was a knight. Stephen told Arainia's story and convinced Kate that she had to take back what was rightfully hers. Together Kate, Eric, Stephen and an extraordinary army has to fight through the obstacles Kate's fake father and the boy that would have been her fiance throws at them. Kate finds out that there is much more to the world than what you're used to and unexpected things happen when you trust in the people you love. Only problem is that those unexpected things can be for better or worse, and luck isn't always on your side. Yet hope is the the only thing she needed to get through their war."

title: Naughty Sarah 1
description:
Sarah just got caught--twice. Her boyfriend of eleven years (see Horny Chad series by Ada O'Flaherty) has just learned that Sarah has taken another lover and her new lover has just learned that Sarah had a boyfriend. What comes next is a desperate plea by Sarah for her Chilean lover, Aldamo, to give her a second chance. He does but it comes with a price--a week of daily spankings, starting immediately. This story captures Sarah's very first punishment spanking and the sweet release that comes after.
Short story, erotica: 5,119 words

title: Astralism
description:
Brotherhood of the White Temple Church. Sermons-Lessons
and Daily Meditations. Metaphysics.
A sermon about visiting the astral realm. Being able to visit the past as well as the Kingdom of Heaven.

title: Tigers in Normandy '44
description: Tigers in Normandy is a detailed account of the efforts of German Panzer aces to halt the advance of the Allies from the Normandy beaches. Focusing on the battles around Caen in June and July 1944, Tigers in Normandy uses first hand accounts to explain how a small number of heavy tanks, along with their elite crews, managed to delay the Allied advance by more than a month.

title: A Woman Unashamed and Other Poems
description:
This is the most recent collection of poems by Paul Engle since Poems in Praise, issued in 1959. Author of such successes as American Song, American Child and The Word of Love, Mr. Engle ranks high among poets of affirmation, and is read by thousands of readers for his celebration of the basic human virtues and his emphasis on American themes.
This book is a departure from his earlier work since it opens with a sequence of poems under the general title of A Woman Unashamed, which, in effect, is a narrative poem placed in Japan. It contains some of the most distinguished work Mr. Engle has done in recent years. Other sections, inspired by the poet's trip to Asia two years ago, illumine scenes and situations which were new to him. There are also lyrics on art, love, an appreciation of Edmund Blunden, and a notable religious series entitled The Things of Christmas Speak.
Many of these poems have been published in such magazines as The New Yorker, The Ladies' Home Journal, Poetry, Harper's Bazaar, Saturday Review, The Texas Quarterly and Focus-Midwest.

title: The Lady of the Forest
description:
Within the old forest of Harazan there is a legendary Silver Unicorn. This Unicorn is a beautiful creature who is older than all the men and woman in the region of Faranar. She is gifted with the power to make the wishes of those who find her come true.
John The Warrior, Alec the Hunter and the Pauper make an unlikely fellowship in their pursuit to find the Silver Unicorn and make all their wishes come true. Along the way John remembers his ghosts, Alec dreams of a new bow and the Pauper dreams of surviving his journey into the depths of Harazan.
This is the story of three brave men who seek The Lady of the Forest.

title: Chemistry: An Experimental Science: Laboratory Manual
description: Prepared by Chemical Education Material Study, under a grant from the National Science Foundation

title: One Step Closer (Lara Martin #1)
description:
Lara Martin is a cross between Janet Evanovich's character Stephanie Plum and The Downside of Being Charlie. It's a story of never giving up and the inner strength of one ordinary woman who can change her fate if she has the courage to try.
Lara Martin isn't the woman she once was. After a bitter divorce and a custody battle that leaves her without her two children Lara must go on a journey to change her life. When a friend faces a life changing tragedy, Lara is inspired to get busy living but her chance may be cut short when she catches the eye of a stranger who unwittingly puts her on a collision course with a malicious rapist.
Detective Brian Hammond is a man who relies on his instincts to get the job done. Meeting Lara, he is instantly beguiled by her beauty and her pain. Things quickly become complicated when a new case emerges and he discovers the very man he's hunting has been hunting Lara.
Can he figure out the mysteries of the case before it's too late or will Lara have to fight for the very thing she wants most, her life?

title: Primary 1 How to Improve Your Mathematics (New Syllabus)
description: How to Improve Your Mathematics contains graded exercises designed to help the pupil grasp the various mathematical concepts. The exercises allow the pupil to practice what has been taught in school A wide variety of questions, including difficult ones, will challenge the pupil's mental capability.

title: The Magic Stick
description: A simple drawing of a boy boy picks up a similarly drawn stick and imagines a world of intricate and fascinating situations, imagining the stick to be many different things.

title: The Life and Times of Abicus Crumble
description:
Abicus Crumble lives in Therenback with his wife Sheila and their two little whipper snappers, Violett and Willy. Therenback is a friendly little town in the sticks - just off the beaten track, between Goannagander and Binwunderin. Abicus is the garbologist on the local council. He likes to keep his bum comfortably but firmly planted in his seat on the gravy train.
Always looking for a way to make a quick buck, Abicus has come up with a plan. He's gonna build a miner's hut. He's heard the rumours- about how the mining companies are snapping up everything in the district.
But this week Abicus will have to work. Hard. This week Therenback are hosting not only The Cup but the first ever Inaugural Ball. This week town is chocked full of tourists. They've come from the big smoke to have a flutter on the nags.

title: How to Write a Blog Post that Sells: Proven Tips and Tricks Every Blogger Needs to Know (Hat of a Professional Freelance Writer Book 2)
description:
There is an art to writing an article that prompts the reader to make a decision to do something. That's the narrow focus of the book that you are reading on your Kindle right now. You will learn how to create an article that gets a reader interested, entices them, informs them, and causes them to make a decision by the time they are finished.
The book you are reading now describes the method I use to create blog articles specifically intended to work a person from the time they click the link until they push the buy or subscribe button at the bottom of the page.
You will learn:
* How to create a title which hooks your reader into your article
* What to put "above the fold"
* Adding emotional triggers
* Connecting with your readers
* What else to put in your article
* Getting them to press "Buy"
* How important are images?
* What about video?

title: I Came Back From Hell: The Barry Ellis Story
description: They called him world champion junkie. The searing true account of a man's miraculous escape from drug addiction. I Came Back From Hell is the story of Barry Ellis, a one-time drug addict who managed to cure himself of the worst illness known to man. Known internationally as the daddy of all junkies, Ellis had taken more drugs than anyone else alive. It is on record at two London chemists that in 18 years he used 46,000 grains of heroin and a not much smaller quantity of cocaine. ENOUGH TO KILL A NORMAL MAN 250,000 TIMES! ! !

title: Low-carbon Development Low-carbon Life
description: China's low-carbon blueprint

title: Trail of the Trefoil: The Way of Life of a Girl Scout
description: Part of the "Way of Life" series

title: My BDSM Journey: The Island Girl Kindle Edition
description: This is a story of a young lady's journey in life and how she discovered the BDSM lifestyle and her place in it.

title: Childhood Traumas (Fallen Angels, #1)
description: After surviving a brutal attack by her father, eleven years old Charlene is sent to a foster home. There she meets the woman in charge, Mother, and three other foster girls, Mooky, Jay and Angie. The eldest, Angie, has a secret that none of the other girls know about. Only Mother knows and she goes through a lot of trouble to hide it from everybody. What is the secret, and what will happen to Charlene when she discovers it?

title: Three Gentlemen of Verona: The Lovelife of London Society
description:
Although presented as a work of fiction, this relentless account of the irresistible progress of three rampant Italian brothers through the grand dames of London society -- with occasional hunting trips to New York and Paris -- reads more and more like fact with each turning page.
Is it?
Or isn't it?

title: Near Words From Far World
description: How Lubuklinggau and Muratara Steal World's Attention.

title: The Dream Killer
description:
Six desperate adolescents, all pleading for their lives-
"HELP ME, DR. BETH!"
Young and inexperienced, Dr. Beth Sommers began her residency at Long Valley Psychiatric hospital prepared for hard work and trouble. She was confident that she could handle anything--until she was placed in charge of a no-holds-barred "encounter group" of disturbed teens.
The encounter group--ranging from a blatant homosexual to a pre-teen harlot--plunges "Dr. Beth" into a whirlpool of emotion and madness, causing her to doubt even her own sanity. Is she the leader--or the led?
(from the back cover)

title: The Seduction of Anita Sarkeesian
description: Because you love satire books, political incorrectness, and free speech, choose "The Seduction of Anita Sarkeesian." Hurry to get your copy before more people ban this book. 106 pages. Cover illustrated by Marie Ban

title: Golf in Columbus at Wyandot Country Club
description: This is a history of a now defunct Donald Ross golf course in Columbus, Ohio.

title: The Five of Nosgarth: Shadow Park
description:
In the sleepy Yorkshire village of Oakstrong five teenage friends find themselves entwined in a series of grisly murders that baffle the local police. Determined in discovering the truth after witnessing a mysterious creature, the five embark on a dangerous adventure that quite literally will take them out of this world...
THE FIVE OF NOSGARTH: SHADOW PARK is an action-packed fantasy-horror adventure that should appeal to both children and adults! It does contain some fantasy violence but is also a quant humorous adventure story that entertains the reader

title: Scalping Foray
description: Poetry, mostly written in the mid 1980s, by Thomas Wilkerson, who grew up in Boaz, Alabama.

many photographs - none credited

'A Complete Tourist's Guide to Colorado, New Mexico, Utah, Nevada, California, Oregon, Puget Sound, and the Great North-West.'
incl., p. 213: table Zinfandel and Berger grape vineyard $$$
p. 218, plate: "California's Mammoth Grape Vine."

title: Detour to Canada
description: Detour to Canada is the story of a student who follows his dream of reaching the land of opportunity "USA", instead there is a detour in his journey and he reaches the land of maple trees "Canada". A funny and witty novel following the students experiences.

title: Jake Finally Has Emilia
description:
After peeping outside her window for weeks, Jake has finally been discovered, and Emilia is determined to let him know that she wants him just as much as he wants her, and in this case, that means she's inviting her voyeur inside to enjoy what he's only watched and desired!
Warning: This ebook contains very explicit descriptions of rough sex and includes oral sex. Only mature adults who won't find that offensive should read this ebook.

title: Get Slim and Stay Slim with Hypnosis
description: A self-help book written by a doctor and hypnotist, focusing on weight-loss techniques.

title: What If? X-Men: Rise and Fall of the Shi'ar Empire
description: THE RISE & FALL OF THE SHI'AR EMPIRE was an X-Men event like no other. Fresh off X-MEN: DEADLY GENESIS, Ed Brubaker took Marvel's mighty mutants off Earth and on an intergalactic journey to stop VULCAN, the third Summers brother, from exacting revenge on the Shi'Ar Empire! But in that final battle in front of the M'Kraan Crystal, what if Vulcan absorbed the very energies that contained it many years ago? In other words, what if Vulcan became PHOENIX? When his unlimited rage is fueled with unlimited power...who will be able to stop him now? Writer Chris Yost (X-23, New X-Men, TV's Fantastic Four) welcomes the return of legendary X-Factor and Alien Legion artist Larry Stroman to the X-Universe with this action-packed issue.

title: Furbitten
description: Epic paranormal romances of vampires and werewolves.

title: In Love and Death
description: One man's journey through life and his search for love and meaning. And through his journey he struggles to deal with and understand life, love, loss and death in his own way.

title: The Color Purple
description: Twilight Sparkle has been keeping a secret from everypony out there: a small, minor detail that nopony would really give a second glance, but for the obsessive-compulsive unicorn, it's just another thing to worry about.

title: Binders Full of Women: An Erotica Story
description:
BINDERS FULL OF WOMEN (Adult Erotica, Erotica for Women) IS AN EROTICA STORY.
LIZ: She is a hard working woman who yearns for the fulfillment of her desires.For months, she has thought of nothing but this man and now, here, he says the words she has only imagined late at night in bed alone, legs spread wide, fingers flittering and fluttering against her silken pearl.
ROMEO: With well kept hair and strong Masculinity, he can be every womans`, except that he has a few skeletons in the closet.
Experience the writing prowess of Liz Stenna is this carefully crafted story that will leave you yearning for more.
Folders of Women is a story you will want to read again and Again.

title: When Darkness Finds You
description:
When Matthew Chambers was twenty-years old, he killed man. Not only was Casey Miller the only witness to his crime, she was the reason for it. No one else knew about what happened.
At least that's what he'd always thought.
Now, years later, Casey Miller is murdered. A week later, Chambers receives one of her paintings in the mail. It depicts an unsettling scene, a past he tried not only to forget, but hide. Why did she sent it to him? Were there others?
When Darkness Finds You is the story of a man who is trying to come to grips with his past even as he's trying to keep it secret. The man who murdered Casey has other plans.
WHEN DARKNESS FINDS YOU is a story about mistakes, secrets, revenge, and love.

title: The First Second of the Universe:  A String Theory Approach
description:
Have you ever wondered what happened during the first second of the universe?
Gerald W. Scanlon takes you to the Alpha point where time and space were created. He shows the forces of the universe unfurling and creating particles on the invisible Higgs Field during the brief time period of the first second.
The proposed model of creation presented in this book uses a string theory approach and shows the multidimensional universe that was created. Strings are shown to be the possible internal structure of quarks and electrons. Masses formed with strings, quarks, or electrons are shown to group together and form the first orbiting "planets". The detailed information needed to calculate their quantum gravity and acceleration is presented.

title: Ghostly Anniversary in Colonial Williamsburg
description:
Taking place in present time, this is a ghostly little tale about a couple celebrating their tenth wedding anniversary at the place where they honeymooned--Colonial Williamsburg, Virginia.
More than just seeing or hearing the undead, they are able to communicate with some spirits.
Sometimes the outcomes are strange and whimsical but other interactions become heart-wrenching and horrifying.

title: Aegean Sun: Rooms and Revelations (Aegean Sun #7)
description:
It's time for another summer season at the Aegean Sun with all the usual characters and several new ones.
How does a well-intentioned act of love turn into a disastrous mistake and will the couple who have been drifting apart use their holiday to make the final break?
Can the youngsters who find themselves at a crossroads discover a way to move forwards without losing each other and is a new relationship just too different to work?
Mark and Zoe try to find ways of spending time together now their rotas aren't compatible, while Nina and Freddy take over the running of the bar and find they are together all the time. How will each couple come to terms with their new working arrangements and where does that leave Michalis, Costas and Maria?
The hotel is again open for business with lots of new customers, but there are also some familiar faces returning and their lives have changed since last year. Will the Aegean Sun work its magic and give everyone the holiday of their dreams?
The entertainment is livening up...

title: SRI AUROBINDO THE STORY OF HIS LIFE
description: Written for young readers, this biography of Sri Aurobindo presents the historical facts of his life in twelve chapters. The language is simple and the format, which breaks the narrative into easy-to-read lines, adds a special cadence and appeal. The style aims to engage readers in the events of Sri Aurobindo's life, as if someone were telling them an interesting story.

title: The Noble Women Scholars of Hadith - Women's Concern with the Prophetic Hadith
description:
[Taken from the back cover]
It is regarding the issue of female education and its importance in Islam. Unfortunately, much of what people view from ignorant Muslims such as suppressing women's educational fascilities has become widespread, hence the significance of this work in the English language.

title: Galactic Storm
description:
This is John Brunner's first novel, published under the house name "Gill Hunt" by Curtis Warren when Brunner was 17. (Brunner wrote the novel when he was 16; he didn't acknowledge it in an official bibliographical sense until 1983).
GALACTIC STORM tells the tale of a young genius who uses a supercomputer to discover an alarming trend of global warming that will see half the world's ice-caps melted within fifty years. This leads to an expedition to the South Pole to investigate the problem, and from there to the discovery of a sinister plot of extraterrestrial origin....

title: Six Girls and Bob
description: A story of patty-pans and green fields.

title: Finches of Mars
description:
'My final Science Fiction novel' - Brian Aldiss
Brian Aldiss has announced that this book, Finches of Mars, will be his final science fiction novel. And what a way to end one of the most illustrious careers in the genres.
Set on the Red Planet, it follows the stories of a group of colonists and the problems they have in setting up a new society. Life can be sustained by new life will not prosper - the women on the planet only ever give birth to stillborn children.
Exploring many of the author's classic themes, this is a landmark novel in any genre.

title: Taboo Fantasies: The Man of The House Didn't Pull Out
description: Casey is desperate for a baby and she knows exactly how to get herself one without ever having to step out of the door. She's seen the way THE MAN OF THE HOUSE looks at her, and she plans to use everything in her little brat handbook to get her way.

title: A Billionaire for Breakfast (The Man Season, #1)
description:
When Tess Jenkins impulsively agreed to join Kylie Preston on a hunt for billionaire husbands in the Cayman Islands she had no idea what kind of trouble they'd get into - or that she'd fall head over heels for a gorgeous beach bum named Angel. But is he all he seems to be, or someone completely different?
A BILLIONAIRE FOR BREAKFAST is a short novelette - the first in a series of sexy - and I do mean sexy - stories called MAN SEASON. It has about 40 pages.

title: T* Shirt Quilts Made Easy
description: Using T Shirts to Make quilts.

title: Lusting After the Cook
description:
Dear Author,
There he is. Gods, I love it when he cooks. I wandered in here the second day that I was living in this wretched city. A block away from my apartment, the smells emanating from this Mongolian grill drew me in like a fly to honey. The food was decent, and I thought I might come here every once in a while when I didn't feel like cooking. Then I saw him. Hat on backwards, tattoos decorating his delectable skin, and the smile he gave me when I stepped up to the grill with my bowl of ingredients. *swoon*
It's been a month now, and I eat here every day. Either for lunch or for dinner, it doesn't matter to me. I think one of the waiters has realized why I come in. Whenever Darren isn't on shift, he gives a knowing smile and says, "I'll get you a menu, Stefan."
Photo Description:
A man dressed in black, hat backwards, is working at a Mongolian Grill as a cook.
This story was written as a part of the M/M Romance Group's"Love is an Open Road" event. Group members were asked to write a story prompt inspired by a photo of their choice. Authors of the group selected a photo and prompt that spoke to them and wrote a short story.
This story may contain sexually explicit content and is intended for adult readers. It may contain content that is disagreeable or distressing to some readers. The M/M Romance Group strongly recommends that each reader review the General Information section before each story for story tags as well as for content warnings.

title: Enslaving Persephone
description:
In the Myths of Ancient Greece, it is said that the innocent Persephone was abducted and made to endure the Underworld for the lust of Hades, its King.
But what if she was not the hapless maiden of the tales of old?
What if, in truth, she had loved him, needing, wanting and wishing above all else to be so enslaved...

title: Tancredi
description:
Tancredi was born on the same day that scientists discovered a new star. It was so small it had gone unnoticed for millennia. Stargazers named it Surprise, in the spirit of a little astrological joke. On closer inspection they made another finding, this one less amusing. After a lifetime of obscurity the diminutive star intended to draw attention to itself. Activity on its surface indicated that one day it would go supernova. A star, so insignificant it had escaped detection, was destined to be the instrument of Armageddon across the Universe.
Humankind has become so riddled with the disease of short-termism that it ignores its fate. Tancredi decides to make it his mission to save the Earth. Made rich by his invention of the MoronOmeter, he buys a ticket for the space ship Invincible on its maiden voyage through the galaxy.
It is a decision that will change everything.

title: The Elements
description: "Chemical elements govern our physical world-on earth and in space. Here is their fascinating story."

title: Cheerilee's Destiny
description: While dealing with especially troublesome students, Starlight Glimmer offers Cheerilee a way to escape the rut her life's become.

title: Favorite Poems of James Whitcomb Riley
description: Here is the best of Riley - the sentiment and pathos, the rich humor and friendliness, the optimism and good cheer, that have made America's beloved National Poet.

title: Daddy Knows Best
description:
Sterek
Derek accidentally calls him brat and that is the end of their "vanilla" sex life.
Words:2233 complete

title: More Than a Game (The Realms, #1)
description: Finn's father, a powerful fairy lord, is abducted by an ambitious rival. It falls to Finn and his brother and sister to find a champion to help get their father back. Finn is not thrilled with the choice of champion, an unknown and unlikely human teenager. However, the champion brings his own sister, who proves a valuable ally in a struggle which costs more than any of them anticipated.

title: Ghosts and Phantoms II
description: Regardless of how hard he tried, someone deep within the crime family wanted him dead. He had baggage, an ex-wife, a temper, and movie-star looks but none of that helped him. Life was a mess until he teamed up with Drake Fargo. Drake was mysterious, hulking huge, knew everyone in law enforcement and Hollywood, and was trusted. Once pulled into the murder of a little-known actress, everything changed. The publicity brought out the demons, and staying alive became a puzzle. Could Rollie and Drake outwit the killers or end up in a block of cement?

title: Through Dimensional Detours
description:
It's the 1980's. The Chapel brothers, proud inheritors of a successful bar located in the very small, very dry, and very hot town of Bowling, Arizona, proceed with their everyday lives completely unaware of the impending misfortune silently waiting in the dark viscous unknown.
THINGS HAPPEN
PEOPLE DISAPPEAR
EVEN MORE THINGS HAPPEN
(as a result of the things preceding them)
Join Tim, Eddie and friends in their possibly epic, likely unexpected, struggle through time and space to find one another, find themselves and discover the life awaiting those who, reluctantly, leave the safety of their homes. This is only book one, so the discoveries may be marginal, incomplete, and at times, allusive. But it will all make sense in the end. Probably.
GET STARTED!

title: Decide On It!
description: It . . . is anything you want or desire and is found in these eight core areas of your life: Mind, Body, Money, Work, Social Life, Relationships, Belief, and Family. What is it you want? This pocket guidebook will help you figure out what you want in your life. You must clearly define what it is you want before you can start working towards it. Once you decide on it--you can realize it!

title: The Threshold of Christianity
description:
Between the Testaments (Westminster Guides to the Bible): This is a book for introducing anyone to the intertestamental period. It's an important volume for studying the overview of the Scriptures in that it makes very clear in simple terms how this important period affects the understanding of the biblical literature.
1. Books and me
2. The changing world
3. The changing community
4. The Dead Sea sect
